TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A dentist who specializes in surgery of the mouth, face, and jaw.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "oral and maxillofacial surgeon"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cirujano oral y maxilofacial"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Dentista que se especializa en cirugía de la boca, la cara y la mandíbula.
